name: Recordation of foreclosure notice
text: The foreclosing mortgagee may record a copy of the foreclosure notice with the assistant registrar of the land court or the bureau of conveyances, as appropriate, in a manner similar to recordation of notices of pendency of action under section 501-151 or section 634-51, as applicable.  The recorded notice shall have the same effect as a notice of pendency of action.  From and after the recordation of the notice, any person who becomes a purchaser or encumbrancer of the mortgaged property shall be deemed to have constructive notice of the power of sale foreclosure and shall be bound by the foreclosure. [L 2011, c 48, pt of §3]
